data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campbell, J. M. (2014): New species and records of Charisius Champion from Mexico and Central America (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Alleculinae). ZooKeys 415: 269-293, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.415.6794, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.415.6794
